["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.debiancn.org","rel":"nofollow","children":"Debian 中文社区"}],"提供了一系列软件，可作为对 Debian 官方仓库的一个补充，其目的之一是改进 Debian 中文用户在 Debian 系统上的使用体验。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"收录范围","children":"收录范围"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["优先提供 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"amd64"}]," 架构的软件。有少部分软件同时提供源码包（使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"deb-src"}]," 启用）。少量软件提供 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"i386"}]," 等其他架构。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用说明","children":"使用说明"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/debiancn/repo","rel":"nofollow","children":"上游使用说明"}],"并将所有 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"https://repo.debiancn.org"}]," 字符串替换为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}]]}]

meta.title: Debian CN 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
